creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
inscription:
Signature, Inscription, Marks, Seals, and Label

Longer inscription (untranslated) + Painted in the 7th Month of 1923 at age 69
markings:
Japanese inscription on L side of roll; L side of roll, in pencil: [Narita Gin'u]; intaglio seal ULQ; intaglio oval and relief seals LLQ; label on L and R roller ends: [Gin'u]

red seals; 吟雨and 泳斎?
title: Plum Blossoms and Poem
